\input{style}

% used by Pandoc
% from https://tex.stackexchange.com/questions/257418/error-tightlist-converting-md-file-into-pdf-using-pandoc

  \setlength{\itemsep}{0pt}\setlength{\parskip}{0pt}}

% for tables and citations generated by pandoc
\usepackage{longtable,booktabs}
\newcommand{\textcite}[1]{\cite{#1}}
